item.title: Talks
item.description: Here is an overview of the recorded talks I have given at different events: SDS 2022 The Evolution of NLP: Voxxed Days ZH 2022 The Capabilities of Semantic Search: SDS 2021 Democratizing Time Series Forecasting:

item.title: Extract Information From PDFs
item.description: Optical Character Recognition (OCR) can be used to extract text information from PDF files. In this blog post, I am using the tesseract framework to extract the weekly menu of a takeaway store.

item.title: Pandas Piping
item.description: The pipe functionality in pandas is an underrated tool for data wrangling.
